Question & Options:
In the movie 'Lakshmi' (2020), which of the following actions are influenced by the ghost (Laxmii) possessing Asif Ahmed's body?
Options:
A. A. Asif Ahmed acts effeminate
B. B. Asif Ahmed becomes a renowned dancer
C. C. Asif Ahmed engages in killing sprees at night
D. D. Asif Ahmed restores peace to the community

In the movie 'Lakshmi' (2020), which of the following statements are true regarding the character Asif Ahmed and his interaction with the ghosts?
Options:
A. Asif Ahmed is kept captive by one of the ghosts.
B. The ghosts are all portrayed as friendly to Asif.
C. One of the ghosts is identified as a Muslim man.
D. Asif Ahmed is a ghost himself.
Correct Answer: Asif Ahmed is kept captive by one of the ghosts., One of the ghosts is identified as a Muslim man.

Question & Options:

Options:

C. Lakshmi
D. Three ghosts
Correct Answer: Asif Ahmed, Mentally disabled boy, Three ghosts
